channel.title: ICS Studio Looking For New Recruits !
channel.description:
Greetings Ladies and Gentlemen I Am Founder of ICS Studio and we are looking for new former member's to our crew!
Right now we are looking for new Testers (of maps) What do we mean under Tester.
* 1.You will test our maps for bugs and will report about it . * 2.You Will test maps and share your ideas and visions about it how could it would look better in community. * 3.Work Smart Work Work Hard Your Future Depends on You !
Also we are looking for help to reorganize our community and make it to these days standards .
Remember our community is based on fanatics to our cause . We Hope Find those who are willing gain valuable experience and learn something new if not we sorry, and yes don't forget we doing it cause we love or enjoying it we don't earn money doing it .

item.title: ICS Studio Looking For New Recruits !
item.dc:creator: Conlaen
item.description:
It’s been a 2 years since i was developing games both of them and games have been canceled for some unknown time (I can hope they will came out in some near future!, Only then we can see does they will come out eventually or not ).

Meanwhile i will work on all existing (Counter-Strike Source) maps (Projects) to finish them and only then i will move forward .

I think they are working on CS maps? Hard to tell.

item.title: ICS Studio Looking For New Recruits !
item.dc:creator: Faks
item.description:
Greetings Ladies and Gentlemen I Am Founder of ICS Studio and we are looking for new former member’s to our crew!

Right now we are looking for new Testers (of maps)
What do we mean under Tester.

* 1.You will test our maps for bugs and will report about it .
* 2.You Will test maps and share your ideas and visions about it how could it would look better in community.
* 3.Work Smart Work Work Hard Your Future Depends on You !

Also we are looking for help to reorganize our community and make it to these days standards .

Remember our community is based on fanatics to our cause .
We Hope Find those who are willing gain valuable experience and learn something new if not we sorry, and yes don’t forget we doing it cause we love or enjoying it we don’t earn money doing it .
